titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of March 3, 2019, as World Hearing Day.
Expressing support for the designation of March 3, 2019, as World Hearing Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
This resolution expresses support for the designation of World Hearing Day.
It also recognizes the importance of preventing hearing loss through self-protective behavior and the importance of patient access to early detection and intervention by health care professionals in the process of identification, treatment, and rehabilitation of hearing loss.
